response.overview: The sci-fi fiction film takes place in 2044 when mysterious spheres appear in five different landscapes of the globe, one of them on the coast of Pyramiden, an abandoned town on an Arctic Ocean island. The objects start to emerge as a result of the intensified melting of polar ice, which affects landscapes worldwide. The film investigates the occurrences by creating speculations about these apparitions which have a particularity: they cannot be captured by cameras, just by human eyes. The film comprises images of scale models produced in the studio and scale models matched with the landscape filmed by a 16mm camera with a time lapse motor.
response.title: Drop Spike
